title: Oct 30: Ghost
description: Draw your very own ghost. Change the colors to win!

steps.hint: We need to set up some variables to color the ghost - **Type** `ghostColor = '#809B79'`
Another variable for the face - **Type** `faceColor = '#634E42'`
Finally a variable for the tongue - **Type** `tongueColor = '#7A5750'`
We’ll use solid shapes, so set the stroke to zero with `stroke 0`
Our ghost leaves a trail behind that we need to draw first, so we'll set the draw color to something slightly darker with `color darken(ghostColor, 10)`
Move into position for the trail with `move 0, 60`
And then draw the trail with `circle 70`
Now we’ll draw the ghost’s body. Set the ghost’s color to our variable with `color ghostColor`
Now move back to draw the body, move back up to the center with `move 0, -60`
Draw the body with `circle 100`
Now we’ll draw the mouth with the faceColor variable we defined. **Type** `color faceColor`.
Now move into position for the mouth with `move -40, 10`
Draw the mouth with `rectangle 80, 35`
The teeth are a polygon. **Hint:** you can copy and paste this: `polygon 10, -10, 20, 0, 30, -10, 40, 0, 50, -10, 60, 0, 70, -10, 80, 0`
Now for the tongue, move to the bottom of the mouth with `move 40, 35`
Set the drawing color to our variable with `color tongueColor`
The tongue is a half-circle of radius 25, which we can draw with `arc 25, 0, 1`
For the eyes, set the drawing color with `color faceColor`
Move into position for the eyes with `move -40, -80`
The eye is then drawn with `circle 10`
Move for the second eye with `move 80, 0`
Draw the second eye with `circle 10`
For our hands, were going to do something new: make a function. **Type** `hand = ->`
This indented block is where your function goes. Any time you call this function this entire block of code will run. Lets set the stroke for our hand with `stroke 10, darken(ghostColor, 10)`
Then draw the first of the three fingers with `line 20, 30`
Then the second with `line 0, 35`
The final finger with `line -20, 30`
Now to draw the hands: make sure you are out of the function block by pressing **BACKSPACE**. Then **type** `move 60, 100` for the first hand.
Draw the hand at the current location with `hand()`
Move over to the left to draw the other hand with `move -200, 0`
Draw the final hand with `hand()`

completion_text: Well done! You can change the color of your ghost by setting ghostColor, faceColor, and tongueColor to whatever you want.
